reviews.review: Что теперь делать за сурвов - вообще неясно. Сидеть по 100 секунд на генераторе тупо неинтересно.
the thrill and excitement alone of being chased by a half-naked demon with a sword is worth all of the shit in my pants 10/10 would recommend
Jogo muito bom, te da vontade de assistir outros filmes de terror e é competitivo. Recomendaria muito para outras pessoas
very fun if you play with friends

O que eu mais admiro no jogo é que os monstros são monstros mesmo, não igual uns jogos aí que anunciam personagem monstro novo, mas na real é só um gostoso(a) com chifre.

é bom mais precisa melhorar muito mas como o jogo ja é bem antigo e continua assim duvido q os desenvolvedores melhorem o jogo pois é muito mal otimizado

geil aber seit dem 6.1.0 update mit den perk updates etc. ist alles scheiße geworden. Wem das update nicht juckt, dem empfehle ich ihn.

this games sucks at all now every killer just fucking camp near the gameplay is fuclking worst

я был рабом до момента скачивания а потом стал добрым и убил нахуй всез своид друзей
I WONDER WHY GAME deverloper doesn't care about sure that MUCH ? Expecially for NURSE I DIED ALMOST EVERY GAME WHEN I MET HER...... I Know that you already nerf her.. but a little more ?

I have been playing this game for over 4 years. After the new patch the game becomes really unfriendly to solo survivor. It's only playable if you are in squad or play killer. Developers seem to not care about what people want from this game and they are trying to 'teach' people how to play this game. I am not sure why they changed so many perks and parameters at the same time - people never ask for it. Behaviour, do you really play the game yourselves?
Vous devez l'acheter, même sans avoir beaucoup d'heure de jeu je peux vous dire que c'est une dinguerie. Voila c'est tout, bon jeu.
本人steam的第一款游戏！整整云了三年，感谢杀机带给我的快乐！

I love the game. I just have one issue which is the game will randomly crash and i have to restart my pc just to open it again, and also it takes forever to matchmake as killer but seconds for survivor. But overall its a great game
游戏有起色了就聘脑残平衡组
iubesc jocul asta din 2017 e minunat
its okay, its only really good with friends.

如果你是周年庆之后入坑的跟我一样的萌新 可以退款了 这游戏不欢迎新人 本质是一个非对称的竞技游戏带点娱乐 但是制作组把这游戏变成一个肝游 游戏升级转生需要大量血点 萌新一把就2w-5w 一个角色满级你就够玩了 还要转生 你就算是再有钱买了dlc 你也没有血点给角色升级 别人都是全紫技能 你带几个低级技能 被屠夫暴打 你也会拖你的队友后退 你的道具级别也是低级的 技能也是低级
如果你要玩屠夫那更是高血压 首先是没血点搞技能 和技能配件 碰见人类级别高的 你估计都不知道别人是怎么跑的  这个策划搞了个付费的端游 思路却是手游的 实属把我整不会了 我已经退不了款了 希望以后购买的萌新注意 你买了这个游戏如果要玩好就准备肝个几百几千小时就为了搞几个破技能 然后等你技能人物配齐了 再开始跟别人比技术 有这个时间 我尼玛干点啥不好？？
额，为什么会有人喜欢做嘲讽怪啊，俺不理解
进入游戏就不能操作了   CG不能跳过 看完就黑屏   鼠标键盘点游戏没反应
游戏很好玩，给老公口了三个小时才给我买的。

Current state of the game is not good, if you don't run in a swf (survive with friends) as survivor you will most likely get destroyed by killers that still camp (though devs said new update will help with this) and still tunnel (though devs said new update will help with this) and will still cuss you out and troll and exploit every flaw in the system to make the match as un-enjoyable as they can once you finish a single generator. I understand the desire for the assymetrical game formula to allow the killer to be much stronger than survivors but making it unbearable to play as survivor without sweating your ass off and in turn forcing killers to sweat to beat the sweats is so ridiculously draining that playing this game isnt worth the time anymore. 

Devs dont care for their player base and run a "well i said it so its happening im right you are wrong" mentality, they continually say they refuse to balance the game around a competitive playstyle then push updates to make you play competitively and say you are bad if you cant win. My father left because of this game
这款游戏CG做得特别好，但即使游戏场景开到最高，模型也都跟一坨屎一样一点儿也不恶心。为了让更多的人玩这个游戏，所以点赞的人玩游戏时的对手都没有牛子，同时自己的牛子会变长/胸部变大
GOOD GAME PLAY IT but killers sucks
amazing game and fun as heck to play with others
The game is good, the only problem is killer queue takes so much time specially for new comers

Killers and characters paywalled behind a free to play style cash shop. Either grind over 1200 hours to unlock all the content for the game you paid for, or pay money. Horrible monitization system. Forced MMR and metas turn this game into something sad. This game feels like a ubisoft game
排的有点慢但丝毫不影响小叮当冲冲冲

This game just doesn't feel fun anymore. Both sides have advantages and disadvantages but every match feels like a sweat fest supreme nowadays. Will change the review once things feel overall better in the game.
不是联动生化危机现在就脱坑，单排逃生根本玩不下去，请ZZZ继续作死，有种技能都别改回来，看你几时凉
